Metadata.Title: Taking Miami
Metadata.Description: Agent 55. Nice to see you come here again.We need you to take out half of the Kronstadt security on top floor. You will leave in the helicopter we managed to bring there. You dont need to hide the bodies as other agent teams will be sent there.We nearly got all of the tape watched, it´s so long.I hope you dont fail us like Agent 12 in New York.Good luck out there and remember. No being seen or any witnesses left.PS : We are closing on the tape. We know it will be in Withletton Creak.
